projects: [{"title":"Robocop","start_date":"Nov 2019","end_date":"Feb 2021","description":"An Autonomous Robot for real-time target detection, locking and target shooting, patrolling and has a collision avoidance mechanism."},{"title":"Smart OCR","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"OCR that converts an organizational chart in any format into Microsoft excel and any document ofany format into an editable document."},{"title":"Visual Recognition Algorithm","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"A web application build using Flask framework which is used for Digital KYC used in financialinstitutes."},{"title":"Smart Cap - GetVision","description":"An artificial eye for visually impaired detecting and recognizing faces, objects and expressions inreal-time using Machine Learning and OpenCV techniques."},{"title":"Wholesale Bookshop Management","description":"Manages a Bookshop using MySql with operations like searching, updating and deletion. Tableswere stored in Oracle database and accessed through SQL queries"}]
